Preserver+

A minimal notes app with rich text formatting.

Try out!

Key Features

Rich text editor. Instant sync. Syntex highlighting.

Stay connected across multiple devices. Online/Offline sync with your account.

Powerful search across all notes content.

PWA (Progressive web app) load faster.

Dark theme mode vs Light theme mode.

Both Local notes and Remote notes.

How it got the name ?

Preserver plus? Name suggest that preserve something that's important can be recollected or revisited later point of time. Exactly three years before one app called preserver was published on electron.io/apps by me, built upon Electron/Angular/PouchDB stack. Same concept is being enhanced here with some more helpful features.

You can find preserver app on github using below link.

Preserver app
